attributes.action: Send humanitarian aid and resources to Yemen.
attributes.additional_details: In 21 days, Yemen will run out of fuel - hospitals and clean water will cease to be available. Children are dying and it is nowhere to be seen in the media. We can do something to help them.
attributes.background: Send humanitarian support and resources, for example the army to provide humanitarian aid, food (rice), fuel for hospitals and water pumps, medical equipment.
